TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaChildrenColumn extends System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn

summary.span: 表示指示一對多關聯性 (One-To-Many Relationship) 的資料庫欄位。

span.span: Represents a database field that indicates a one-to-many relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 動態資料應用程式中，類別代表表示一對多關聯性或父子式關聯性的資料庫欄位。In ASP.NET Dynamic Data applications, the class represents a database field that indicates a one-to-many relationship or a parent-child relationship. 類別表示一對多關聯性的父資料表中的欄位。The class represents the field in the parent table of the one-to-many relationship. 不過，您可以使用存取子資料表物件屬性。However, you can access the child table object by using the property. 您也可以使用擷取的子資料表中的外部索引鍵欄位屬性。You can also retrieve the foreign-key field in the child table by using the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Overview

span.span: An object that represents the child table of the one-to-many relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得物件，表示一對多關聯性的子資料表。Use the property to get an object that represents the child table of the one-to-many relationship. 您可以使用來存取父資料表屬性。You can access the parent table by using the property.

span.span: An object that represents the foreign-key field in the child table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您取得子資料表中的欄位的參考。The property enables you to get a reference to the field in the child table.

param.name: row
param.span: 包含外部索引鍵欄位的資料列。

summary.span: 取得子資料表的清單動作頁面路徑。

span.span: Gets the path of the list-action page for the child table.

returns.span: 子資料表的清單動作頁面路徑。

span.span: The path of the list-action page for the child table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，當您想要擷取的清單動作頁面使用指定的資料列當做父代的子資料表。Use the method when you want to retrieve the list-action page for the child table using the specified row as a parent. 包含外部索引鍵欄位值中指定的 URL 附加查詢字串值來取得路徑`row`參數。The path is obtained by appending a query-string value to the URL that contains the foreign-key field value specified in the `row` parameter. 使用方法會叫用相同方法並傳遞的第一個參數的動作。Using the method is the same as invoking the method and passing the action as the first parameter.

summary.span: 取得子資料表的指定動作頁面路徑。

span.span: Gets the path for the specified action page of the child table.

summary.span: 取得子資料表的指定動作頁面路徑。

span.span: Gets the path of the specified action page of the child table.

returns.span: 子資料表的指定動作頁面路徑。

span.span: The path of the specified action page of the child table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的子資料表的指定的動作頁面路徑。The method returns the path of the specified action page for the child table. 傳回的路徑以 ASP.NET 動態資料應用程式定義的路由為基礎，並具有指定的資料列當做父代。The path returned is based on the routes that are defined for the ASP.NET Dynamic Data application and has the specified row as a parent. 包含外部索引鍵欄位值中指定的 URL 附加查詢字串值來取得路徑`row`參數。The path is obtained by appending a query-string value to the URL that contains the foreign-key field value specified in the `row` parameter. 如果`row`是`null`，此方法會傳回空字串。If `row` is `null`, his method returns an empty string. 您可以使用中定義的值類別的`action`參數。You can use the values defined in the class for the `action` parameter.

summary.span: 取得子資料表的指定動作頁面路徑。

span.span: Gets the path for the specified action page of the child table.

returns.span: 子資料表的指定動作頁面路徑。

span.span: The path of the specified action page of the child table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的子資料表的指定的動作頁面路徑。The method returns the path of the specified action page for the child table. 路徑根據指定的路徑與指定的資料列中，當做父代。The path is based on the specified path with the specified row as a parent. 包含外部索引鍵欄位值中指定的 URL 附加查詢字串值來取得路徑`row`參數。The path is obtained by appending a query-string value to the URL that contains the foreign-key field value specified in the `row` parameter. 如果`row`是`null`，這個方法會傳回空字串。If `row` is `null`, this method returns an empty string. 如果`path`已`null`，則方法會傳回根據 ASP.NET 動態資料應用程式定義的路由路徑。If `path` is `null`, the method returns the path based on the routes defined for the ASP.NET Dynamic Data application. 您可以使用中定義的值類別的`action`參數。You can use the values defined in the class for the `action` parameter.

summary.span: 初始化呼叫建構函式時可能無法使用的資料。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法直接呼叫這個方法。This method cannot be called directly. 若要自訂初始化，您可以衍生自這個類別並覆寫`Initialize`方法。To customize initialization, you can derive from this class and override the `Initialize` method. 如果您覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底控制項的`Initialize`方法。If you override this method, call the base control's `Initialize` method.
